txt.en: You scan the wall for signs of weakness and spot a small path sealed by smouldering debris...
Blood of the Black Serpent
'Ride, Snowmane! Ride into the Serpent's maw!'
'Flee! Flee, cowards! Your lord is hewn and your banner thrown down!'
You hear a great crash as the path through the Rammas Echor opens anew!
As you pass beyond the Rammas Echor, you see a field of Haradrim riders before you...
'Rain arrows down upon them!'
'You are a brazen lot to cut such a swath of death through our men… and all to stand before me.'
'Stand down - all of you! This one is mine...'
'Do not let them pass! They are too deep in our ranks already!'
'The wraith has offered me these lands, but I have no love for them.'
'The one called Gothmog tasked us with your capture, and I mean to see it done.'
'I shall warn the King and his sons!'
'Even if all who inhabit them were slain, the sight of these fields would still repulse me.'
'You have bested my men, but luck can only carry you so far.'
'These Men of Gondor and Rohan are soft… untrained… and soon they shall all be dead.'
'None have sold their sword as profitably as I, [placeholder], and you shall fetch the finest price of all.'
'My sons!'
'So, it's to be a proper fight. Two of you, to me!'
'Our poisons coat every blade… every single arrow...'
'So then, [placeholder]... prove your worth!'
'I weighted the gate for you - hurry through!'
'You will live, [placeholder], but only in agony!'
'Amusing - let us try three then.'
'Each man's death has only to find him now.'
'Stay.'
'The field is covered in foes, but perhaps you can press deeper into their ranks by skirting the wall.'
'The wall is breached in many places. Travel further south and find a path through!'
'Enough! Bind them and deliver them to Osgiliath!'
'Go now! We will guard your advance!'
'Slay them, my sons!'
'Tunkild! To me!'
'Run them down!'
'Friend, they are too many here...'
'If you take the wall, you may break through.'
'Go with haste - we will hold them back as long as we can!'
'You threaten our father and the sovereignty of Harad…'
'…And for that you are condemned.'
'Feckless boy!'
'Your deaths shall be swift, curs! Archers, take aim!'
'Death to Gondor! Death to Roh-'
